context: Do you know of any movies that featured the actress, Louise Lasser?
Yes, Louise Lasser starred in Take the Money and Run with Woody Allen and also Such Good Friends alongside Ken Howard. Have you seen either of those?
No, but O remember To Rome with Love, starring Judy Davis that was good.
That is a good one. Judy Davis was also great in The Break-Up and Swimming Upstream. You should give those a try if you haven't already.
I think The Break Up was written and starring Vince Vaughn.
resp: Yes, Vince Vaughn also wrote Couples Retreat.
